revised_title: An Uncommon Disease among the Indians in Nantucket and Martha's Vineyard
tldr: In 1764, an extraordinary disease affected the Indian population in Nantucket and Martha's Vineyard islands in New England, causing a high mortality rate among those with Indian blood. The disease did not affect the English population, despite their exposure to similar conditions. The cause of the disease remains unclear, but it is speculated that it might be part of the "Arcana of Providence".
